course_description: Oxford Studies 100R is a one-hour, elective, multidisciplinary course which, through attendance, participation, and written reflection, encourages thoughtful involvement in the cultural, intellectual, and artistic activities available in our community beyond the confines of the traditional classroom. It may be repeated for credit.
sections: Class Nbr: 4168, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: Segre/Valentine, Status: Open
